 Greatest Hits 2 is a greatest hits album by American rock band Journey. The compilation album is the band's second greatest hits package. It was released 23 years after the first greatest hits package in 1988.


 Designed as a companion piece to the original Journey Greatest Hits -- a compilation released some 23 years earlier in 1988 and reissued on vinyl the same week this sequel arrived in 2011 -- Greatest Hits, Vol. 2 collects the singles, album rock hits, and album tracks that didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t make it onto the first hits disc. This says nothing about the quality of the songs -- they are the kinds of tunes that make for a Ã¢â‚¬Å“more of the bestÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ compilation, songs reminiscent of other hits but just not quite as immediate or epic, not as memorable for one reason or another -- but thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not really anything to entice a listener outside of the notion of completeness. And for those who do believe in completeness and yet didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t spring for 2001Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s double-disc The Essential Journey and so are in need of a companion to that 1988 collection, this serves nicely. Reviewed by Stephen Thomas Erlewine of allmusic.com
